description: A premium and technical boot that combines the support of a hiking boot with the agility of a approach shoe designed for off-road terrain or a long day of city sightseeing. The TX Hike Mid Leather GTX can do it all. Thanks to the wide fit & environmentally conscious materials you can end your day with happy feat and peace of mind.
name: La Sportiva TX Hike Mid Leather GTX - Mens

specs.value: Compression EVA with Co-molded stabilizing insert
Vibram® Ecostep EVO with Impact Brake System™

Ideal for hikers looking for a nimble shoe in a competitively light package with a stable upper, cushioned interior and an outsole tread that offers sustainable and uncompromising traction in any conditions
